alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 8:57PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Grant and northwestern Luna Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 856 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Gage. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gage. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 55 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
